Plot: A ghostwriter hired to complete the memoirs of a former British prime minister uncovers secrets that put his own life in jeopardy.
Title: The Ghost Writer
Writer: Robert Harris (screenplay), Roman Polanski (screenplay), Robert Harris (novel)
Actors: Ewan McGregor, Jon Bernthal, Tim Preece, James Belushi
tomatoConsensus: While it may lack the revelatory punch of Polanski's finest films, Ghost Writer benefits from stylish direction, a tense screenplay, and a strong central performance from Ewan McGregor.
